amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds provided by this Act from closing campgrounds operated by the Army Corps of Engineers that are located at Lake Sidney Lanier, Georgia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
